title: Drawing, 1893–94
medium: Brush and water-colors over graphite on heavy cream illustration board
markings: Blind stamp: A crowned escutcheon with BRISTOL and FRANCE in ovoid. Cardboard.
signed: In brown ink below image at right: Whitney Warren f
inscribed: Below image in ink:   Arrival / Scale, one inch = 10 ft.,"
description: Elevation, executed in delicate watercolor washes, showing the front entrance, walkway, tented sunporches on second story at left and right, and suggested landscaping. Below image, a scale and numerical annotations.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, 1893–94.
1893–94. Brush and water-colors over graphite on heavy cream illustration board. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1941-49-2.
